column4: Hello. I have Win7 and Ubuntu in this computer. I want to wipe GRUB boot loader, how to do it ? I tried old DOS fdisk /mbr but isnt working, probably because NTFS. Any clue ?
why do you want to wipe the boot loader?
because i want to remove the ubuntu partition from this laptop
well, just boot up Windows 7 and go to Control Panel
its possible to do it under control panel? How ?
then wait for it to load
after it loads, right-click on the partition with ubuntu on it
wait. I know how to delete Ubuntu partition. I want to know how to delete GRUB from mbr
anyway, will try win rescue command prompt. Many thanks
your welcome. and also, GRUB is in the ubuntu partition
